attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All of us who live in the UK have to pay for items that we buy from our own pocket - we can't claim our council tax back, nor can we claim for anything else we buy. 

It is time that we abolished MPs expenses. Theft is theft - even if it is "within the rules"

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
